parameter.value: Hey there, |PLAYERNAME|. I'm Tom the tanner. If you have fresh corpses, i buy them.
I'm the local tanner. I buy fresh animal corpses, tan them, and convert them into fine leather clothes which I then sell to merchants.
My name is Tom the tanner.
That's my job. It can be dirty at times but it provides enough income for my living.
Dixi and Lee'Delle sell my leather clothes in their shops.
I'm buying fresh corpses of rats, rabbits and wolves. I don't buy half-decayed ones. If you have any for sale, trade with me.
She buys my fine leather clothes.
Her nose is a little high in the air, I think. She never shakes my hand.
I buy dead rabbit, dead rat an dead wolf.
